headline: Is Apple’s Stock Still a Good Bet After 14.4% Rally in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Apple stock is a bargain or priced for perfection? You're not alone. Getting to the bottom of its true value takes a closer look than headlines provide. Apple's shares are up 1.1% over the past week, 3.1% over the past month, and have gained an impressive 14.4% year-to-date, hinting at both resilience and optimism among investors. Tech sector momentum and ongoing innovation hype have kept Apple in the spotlight. New product rumors and regulatory headlines have also added fuel to...

headline: Omdia: Global Wearable Band Shipments Up 3%, Setting Stage for Strong Holiday Season
summary: LONDON, December 01, 2025--The wearable band market grew by a modest 3% to 54.6 million units in 3Q, according to the latest research from Omdia. Despite the low volume growth, the market’s value surged 12% to $12.3 billion, reflecting a shift toward premium devices.

content.title: Omdia: Global Wearable Band Shipments Up 3%, Setting Stage for Strong Holiday Season
content.summary: LONDON, December 01, 2025--The wearable band market grew by a modest 3% to 54.6 million units in 3Q, according to the latest research from Omdia. Despite the low volume growth, the market’s value surged 12% to $12.3 billion, reflecting a shift toward premium devices.

thumbnail.caption: Worldwide wearable band shipments by region, Q3 2024 versus Q3 2025

headline: Is Apple Giving Intel’s Foundry Ambitions a Much-Needed Boost?
summary: Intel (NASDAQ:INTC) has long eyed its foundry business as a path to revival. Launched in 2021 as Intel Foundry Services (IFS), the unit aims to manufacture chips for external clients, challenging the dominance of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (NYSE:TSM). Intel’s ambitions hinge on advanced nodes like 18A, with high-volume production begun at its Arizona facility, backed ... Is Apple Giving Intel’s Foundry Ambitions a Much-Needed Boost?
